value: return user.firstname && user.lastname ? user.firstname + " " + user.lastname : user.userName;
return uiTranslate("Another resource already exists with the name defined in the resource's zip content. To update an existing resource, click the Update icon on the appropriate resource.");
return uiTranslate('Invalid file format. For more information, check the log file.');
return uiTranslate("An error has occurred. For more information, check the log file.");

description: This page allows to manage UI resources of an application. It is dedicated to Administrator-like profiles. You can export it and edit it in the UI Designer.
